name: MVVMBasic
summary: ¡España!This is a generic version of a MVVM pattern. The Model-View-ViewModel pattern can be used on all XAML platforms.

name: MVVMLight
summary: ¡España!MVVM Light is a popular, 3rd party framework based on the Model-View-ViewModel pattern.

name: CodeBehind
summary: ¡España!This is the traditional model for an application where logic is handled in the code-behind.  For a quick application, this is a great option.
